This is probably the best game that come out in 2011.

The story telling and puzzles in this game are on a whole different level, valve producing such a banger is expected but I still overwhelmingly loved this game, one of my favourite games of all time! If you somehow haven't played the portal series yet please do yourself a favour and try them out, I promise you won't regret it!

An all-time classic game. Both portals are excellent, but Portal 2 is really refined. Holds up.

11/10 dialogue, humor, gameplay, and puzzles. this game slaps

One of my all time favorite games alongside its precursor. Great puzzles, fun story , and wonderful lore. I love it. beyond the single player  story, the multiplayer co-op is excellently designed and very fun. the graphics are also very nice and seamless.

It' s a very fun and well thought out puzzle game. The graphics are amazing and the dialogue is great. From the sarcasm to the funny voice lines. Overall, this game is amazing and I would definitely play it again.
